needed yarn bulky #6 approximately 75g of main color color a green hook size e hook or 3 5 mm 14 mm safety eyes scissors sewing needle stitch marker fiberfill stuffing pipe cleaners optional abbreviations magic_ring= magic_ring- crochet single_crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop blo= back loops only chain= chain stitch f/o= fasten_off single_crochet= single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet sl= slip_stitch flo= front loops only double_crochet= double_crochet stitch inc3= 3 single_crochet in the same stitch increase= increase- make two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch decrease=decrease- crochet two stitches together using the decrease method 4 single_crochet increase x 6= repeat the pattern between parentheses 6 times notes do not join rounds unless stated work in a continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of each round all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern sweet oddity art 2 head and body crocheted from top of head to tip of tail with color a 1 make 4 single_crochet into a magic_ring= 4 2 increase in each st around= 8 3 single_crochet in each st around 4 increase x 4 4 single_crochet= 12 5 single_crochet increase x 4 4 single_crochet= 16 6-7 single_crochet in each st around place eyes in between rounds 4 and 5 the 1st eye will be placed above the 1st increase on round 4 count 4 holes over and place the 2nd eye make sure they are lined up well on the face tip you may need to adjust eye and nose placement depending on yarn you use 8 decrease x 8= 8 stuff the head 9-11 2 sl 4 half_double_crochet 2 sl 12 increase 7 single_crochet= 9 13 single_crochet in each st around 14 8 single_crochet increase= 10 15 single_crochet in each st around 16 increase 9 single_crochet= 11 17 single_crochet in each st around 18 10 single_crochet increase= 12 19 single_crochet in each st around now for the neck to make the neck a little more bendy twist together 5 pipe cleaners then fold them in half insert them into the neck and stuff around them not necessary but will help the neck be more sturdy as well 20 7 single_crochet increase x 4 single_crochet= 16
